inclusion.criterion: Stage IV disease, according to AJCC 6th edition
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: biopsy proven or with unequivocal evidence of metastatic disease

inclusion.criterion: Paraffin tissue block is required from the primary tumor tissue or from diagnostic metastatic biopsy at time of relapse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performance status of 0,1 or 2 by ECOG criteria (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group)
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: patient's overall health and treatment plan

inclusion.criterion: Normal organ and bone marrow function documented within 14 days prior to enrollment as defined by the protocol
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Performance status of 0,1 or 2 by ECOG criteria (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: More than 1 prior chemotherapy for the treatment of recurrent or metastatic breast cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with cisplatin, carboplatin, or other platinum chemotherapy agents
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active brain metastases or unevaluated neurological symptoms suggestive of brain metastases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Intercurrent illness or other major medical condition or comorbid condition that might affect study participation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant history of uncontrolled cardiac disease such as uncontrolled hypertension, unstable angina, recent myocardial infarction, uncontrolled congestive heart failure, cardiomyopathy either symptomatic or asymptomatic but with decreased ejection fraction <45%
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Renal dysfunction for which cisplatin dose would either require dose modification or would be considered unsafe
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History or other malignancy that was not treated with curative intent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.
